title: B L ASSOCIATES
author: ''
date: '2022-08-29'
slug: b_l_associates
categories: []
tags: []
r_init: |-
  
description: The Government of Canada spent an estimated $8.0K
  in 2021-2022 on contracts with B L ASSOCIATES. The average
  contract duration was 1.76 year, and the average contract
  value (not including contracts under $10k) was $1.8M.
  The longest contract was 3.05 year. The largest contract
  by value (including amendments) was $4.1M.
most_recent_fiscal_year_total: '8.0K'
most_recent_fiscal_year_year: '2021-2022'
s431_number_of_contracts_by_vendor: '5'
s431_number_of_contracts_by_vendor_with_amendments: '1'
s431_number_of_contracts_amendments_percentage: '20%'
s432_mean_amendment_increase_percentage_by_vendor: '98%'
s434_mean_number_of_amendments_by_vendor: '1'
s433_total_amendment_increase_value_by_vendor: '1.4M'
s424_mean_duration_by_vendor: '1.76'
s421_mean_contract_value_by_vendor: '1.8M'
s425_max_duration_by_vendor: '3.05'
s422_max_contract_value_by_vendor: '4.1M'
